page.title: 09WHAT MY PARENTS HAVE DONE-
page.content:
What my mum and dad have done today
by Lucy Gibbs.
June 4th. 1985.
Today my day is going to be milking because it is his turn. We have about one hundred cows so I have to wait till dad comes in. On Mondays my mum goes to choir with Mrs.Morrish but I don't think she is going today because Mrs.Morrish is in hospital. My mum does go to work but not this week because she is having a holiday from work because the ladies at Kirdford Growers are cleaning at the moment.She does the sorting out of the apples and she gets paid a lot of money.
